content.question: The poster was most likely designed to appeal most directly to which of the following groups?

choices.label: Veterans of the First World War
Members of the German Communist Party
Workers unemployed as a result of the Great Depression
Ethnic Germans living in newly created states in eastern Europe

content.answer: Workers unemployed as a result of the Great Depression

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
